name: EZ POPUPS
author: Yassir Ennazk

sections.description:
EZ POPUPS is a lead generation service that allows you to create popups, slide ins, fullscreen overlays, top and bottom bars… Using a fully fledged drag and drop builder.

The EZ POPUPS plugin allows for an easy integration of the EZ POPUPS service with your WordPress website.

Just install the plugin, paste the HTML code provided to you on your account at http://app.ezpopups.com/ and you are ready to go.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin.

  2. Go to Settings > EZ POPUPS

  3. Paste the HTML code provided to you inside of your EZ POPUPS account > Integrations

Done.

Most tutorials and instructions can be found on www.ezpopups.com

screenshots.caption: EZ POPUPS settings under Settings > EZ POPUPS
An example of an overlay popup
You can embed a popup right inside your content using shortcodes or easily add two step opt-in functionality
